attributes.action: Stop MP`s taking documents/file/papers out of the House of  Parliament
attributes.additional_details: I think that it is time that accommodation be provided in the houses of parliament for Mp`s who have to work late or have a long way to travel. There have been too many times when private papers, CD`s,documents etc, etc, have been lost or misplaced and could have fallen into the wrong hands. This would also help stop/control clandestine meetings/affairs and reduce the need for claiming non-existent (dodgy) expenses! They already have 1st class restaurant and washroom facilities so, it wouldn`t cause too much upheaval to provide sleeping accommodation, the armed services, nurses, firemen / women, carers, support workers and many other people have to do this and, it`s about time our MP`s lived in the real world
